mean_cn: n.望远镜；  v.缩短，精简；（使）套入；  adj.套筒的，伸缩式的
mean_en: a piece of equipment shaped like a tube, containing lenses, that you look through to make objects that are far away appear larger and nearer
sentence: You can see many distant stars through the telescope.
sentence_trans: 通过望远镜，你可以看到许多遥远的星星。
word_etyma: tele远，传送 + scope看 → 看远方 → 望远镜
